NOTES: On February 27, 1996, the Company completed a merger with Bendata Inc underwhich the company exchanged 1,500,000 shares of its common stock for all of Bendata's outstanding capital stock. All financial data have been restated to include Bendata for each period presented.
Included in the first quarter of 1997 is a restructuring charge of $5.3 million which includes severance costs, office closing costs and consolidation costs.

The pro forma information for the first quarter of 1996 excludes the one-time charge for merger expenses of $3,416,000 ($2,609,000 after-tax) and the one-time tax charge of $575,000 due to the conversion of Bendata from an S corporation to a C corporation as a result of the merger.
